name: AIO Contact Lite
author: Harshit Peer

sections.description:
AIO Contact Lite allows you to add multiple contact options to your website for your users. You can add WhatsApp, Telegram, Skype, Viber, etc. It has a very simple and unique Admin interface which makes it easy to use. You can also sort items with just drag-drop by grabbing the item title and moving the item to the desired position. It has a built-in font awesome icon picker which gives you access to over 1300 different fonts.

Would you like the ability to add Agents, put Contact Forms and use Shortcodes? Check out the Premium Version which is available at an unbelievable price!
sections.installation:
Option 1

  • Within your WordPress admin area, navigate to “Plugins”.
  • Click the “Add New” link near the top of your screen.
  • Click the “Upload” link.
  • Click the browse button and navigate to wherever you downloaded the zip file to, select the zip file
  • Click the “Install Now” button
  • Click “Activate Plugin”

Option 2

  • Extract the zip file
  • Upload (ftp) the resulting aio-contact-lite folder to your /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  • Activate “AIO Contact Lite” through the “Plugins” menu in WordPress
